title: Password Reset
content: Users can reset their password from Settings > Security. If Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) is enabled, a backup code or registered device is required.

title: Email Verification Failed
content: If you see 'Verification link expired', request a new link from Profile > Email. Verification links expire in 10 minutes.

title: Billing and Subscription
content: Basic plan: $10/user/month. Pro plan: $25/user/month with audit logs and SSO. Enterprise: custom pricing with SLA and dedicated support.

title: SSO Login Issues
content: SSO failures often occur if the identity provider metadata is outdated. Refresh SAML metadata under Admin Portal > SSO Settings.

title: Exporting Reports
content: Admins can export audit reports in CSV or JSON from the Analytics tab. Exports over 100 MB are automatically compressed.

title: API Rate Limits
content: Each API key is limited to 200 requests per minute. For bulk imports, use the /batch endpoint supporting up to 10,000 records per request.

title: System Outage Notification
content: Outages and maintenance updates are posted at status.productgenie.io. Users can subscribe via email or RSS feed.

title: Dark Mode Not Saving
content: If dark mode settings revert after reload, clear browser cache and ensure cookies are enabled. Preferences are stored locally per device.

title: Email Templates Not Loading
content: If templates fail to load, check Template Library permissions under Admin > Communication. Refresh the page or reselect the workspace.

title: CSV Upload Timeout
content: Uploads larger than 50 MB may time out. Split large files or use the asynchronous upload option under Data Import > Advanced.

title: Notification Emails Delayed
content: Delays are often caused by spam filters or throttling by mail providers. Verify that notifications@productgenie.io is whitelisted.

title: Dashboard Widgets Missing
content: Widgets may disappear if filters are applied. Reset dashboard filters or click Restore Defaults in the top-right corner.

title: Mobile App Login Error
content: If mobile users cannot log in, ensure the app is updated to the latest version and check that device time is set to automatic.

title: Webhook Delivery Failed
content: Webhook failures often occur due to expired endpoints. Check the receiving serverâ€™s SSL certificate and retry the request.

title: 2FA Device Lost
content: If a 2FA device is lost, sign in using a backup code or contact your admin to reset Two-Factor Authentication under Security Settings.

title: Slow Page Load
content: Slow load times are often caused by ad blockers or heavy browser extensions. Try using an incognito window or clearing local cache.

title: Plan Upgrade Failed
content: If payment fails during upgrade, verify billing information under Account > Billing. Retry with a valid card or contact support.
